comment: I enjoyed Sra. Bley. She always made sure that we were involved and truly cared about how we did in her class. Any time we had recommendations, she would listen and try to incorporate them. This course is difficult regardless of the teacher, but if I could re-do it, I would take her class again. The book is a must!
She's really nice. Her tests can be kind of hard; pay attention to the culture part at the end. But she's really helpful and funny and she'll help you out however she can.

A very good class and Ms. Bley is a very good professor.  Extremely helpful and wishes for students to succeed.  Enthusiastic and her clarity makes a big difference.  Too lenient.  One table of students were very disrespectful throughout the semester. Like middle schoolers.

BEST professor I have ever had! She loves the Spanish language and makes you love it as well. She is extremely helpful when it comes to going over the material outside of class, helping you make up assignments, and preparing you for your exams. I have never enjoyed Spanish classes, she makes it fun. AMAZING lady!
She is an awesome Professor! Her quizzes are easy and she gives students chances to make up tests/projects/quizzes in her office. TAKE HER!
Sra. Bley is an excellent teacher.  She speaks clearly and is easy to understand.  She is very helpful.  She works with you until you understand the material.  She keeps the class interesting.

The professor gives challenging work that requires creativity, but she is a more than reasonable grader. She will go out of her way to help you. She speaks so you can understand. I wasn't very interested prior to class because it's my last one, but I think it's worth while. Consider yourself married to your textbook and the textbook's website.

Great teacher!Lenient with mistakes.When she speaks in Spanish to the class, she speaks slowly and clearly; she also uses hand jestures and body language to help you understand.She's always asking the class if we understand before she moves on to new material.Very sweet and she shares lots of humble stories about her journey to the U.S. from Cuba.

She's a terrible teacher. Makes quizzes that are harder than tests. Will grade papers, but she never shows how your overall grade is. Very biased towards her students. If you're a brown noser then this is the class for you. Otherwise, avoid because if she doesn't like you, then you will not get above a C. She's one of those fake nice people too.

She is a very nice and enthusiastic teacher, but she is not clear in her expectations and grading. I had no idea what my grade was all semester. If you show up to class every time, you will probably get a B. An A, if you try hard.

I absolutely hate this teacher. She is never very clear on what to do/whats required for us. She does not keep up with grades and if you ask to see your grade she admits that she does not keep up with them. I'm still not sure if I'm even passing or failing. Don't take her.

Cute! Loves visual aids to get you interested in the language and to easily learn the language. A lot of class work. Tests and quizzes were not that hard. She does try to help you before you take them.

She is very kind and sweet and really goes slowly so that you understand the language. Unfortunately, she does not properly prepare you for her tests (which she often doesn't write herself). Some of the vocabulary and work on the tests is not covered in class. Do not be afraid to ask questions as sometime further explanation is needed.

Professor Bley is AWESOME! She is so sweet and loaded with interesting stories! I was scared to take a foreign language until her class. She makes you feel SO COMFORTABLE. She loves and appreciates ALL of her students (since the dear soul also teaches high school!) I got an A. TAKE HER! If only she taught SPAN 1002 this semester...

Very nice and flexible with grading.  Understands that this is a foreign language to people.  Very fun with songs and dances.  Not too strict, but attendance is mandatory as with all other Spanish classes.  3 written assignments, 2 quizzes, and 3 tests + oral.  Quia homework due as well with every chapter covered.  Great prof!!
